BUTTONS.autoFileTagsDescription: Enable auto-generated tags based on video file names
BUTTONS.autoFileTagsMoreInfo: See these in the Details view. When enabled, they will also be searchable with the Tags filter
BUTTONS.autoFolderTagsDescription: Enable auto-generated tags based on folder names
BUTTONS.autoFolderTagsMoreInfo: See these in the Details view. When enabled, they will also be searchable with the Tags filter
BUTTONS.clipsThumbnailDescription: Use default thumbnails instead of preview clip thumb
BUTTONS.clipsThumbnailHint: Use default thumbnails instead of preview clip thumb
BUTTONS.clipsThumbnailMoreInfo: Makes use of same thumbnail from the other views
BUTTONS.compactViewMoreInfo: Hides file names. Only affects Thumbnails & Clips view
BUTTONS.dangerousDeleteDescription: Dangerously delete bypassing trash / recycling bin
BUTTONS.dangerousDeleteMoreInfo: Useful for videos on a network drive
BUTTONS.doubleClickMoreInfo: When enabled, you will need to double click to open a video
BUTTONS.dragVideoOutOfAppDescription: Allow dragging videos outside of app
BUTTONS.dragVideoOutOfAppMoreInfo: Useful for dragging videos directly into a video editor
BUTTONS.duplicateHashMoreInfo: Show all files that are likely identical to each other. These files are identical in size and the three small sections that were checked have identical data
BUTTONS.duplicateLengthMoreInfo: Show all files that are the same duration
BUTTONS.duplicateSizeMoreInfo: Show all files that are very similar to each other in file size
BUTTONS.excludeMoreInfo: Filter to exclude any videos that contain the filter word
BUTTONS.fileMoreInfo: Filter for videos containing each of the search words
BUTTONS.fileUnionMoreInfo: Filter for videos containing any of the search words
BUTTONS.folderMoreInfo: Filter for folders containing each of the search words
BUTTONS.folderUnionMoreInfo: Filter for folders containing any of the search words
BUTTONS.fuzzyMoreInfo: Filter which updates the results as you type. It finds videos even if the spelling is not an exact match
BUTTONS.hideOfflineMoreInfo: Hide from view videos that are from folders that are not currently connected to the computer
BUTTONS.hoverScrubMoreInfo: Hovering over thumbnails shows preview screenshots
BUTTONS.magicMoreInfo: Filter which updates the results as you type. It displays all videos that contain the search term and every video inside any folder that contains the search term
BUTTONS.manualTagsMoreInfo: See, add, and remove tags in the Details view
BUTTONS.openAtTimestampDescription: Start playing video from time of clicked screenshot
BUTTONS.openAtTimestampMoreInfo: Only affects Thumbnails, Filmstrip, and Details views. Requires you manually set the video player below. Works on Windows with MPC, VLC, and POT players only; on Mac only with VLC
BUTTONS.playlistButtonDescription: Open all current gallery videos as a playlist
BUTTONS.playlistButtonMoreInfo: This creates a .pls file and opens it with your default video player. Playlist will not include files inside folders if 'Show folders' is selected.
BUTTONS.randFolderScreenDesc: Show random screenshots on Folder view
BUTTONS.regenerateLibraryDescription: Regenerate all library metadata, except thumbnails and user entered metadata
BUTTONS.regexMoreInfo: Uses case-insensitive RegEx matching against file name
BUTTONS.relatedTrayMoreInfo: Shows related videos based on the last video you clicked
BUTTONS.resetSettingsDescription: Reset settings and buttons to their default values
BUTTONS.returnToFirstScreenshotMoreInfo: Return to first screenshot when your cursor leaves a thumbnail preview
BUTTONS.showDeleteButtonDescription: Show 'Delete' option in the right-click menu
BUTTONS.showDeleteButtonMoreInfo: Deleting a file moves it to your computer's trash / recycling bin
BUTTONS.showDetailsTrayMoreInfo: Shows the details of the last clicked video
BUTTONS.showFoldersMoreInfo: Only affects Thumbnails, Text, and Clips views
BUTTONS.showFreqMoreInfo: Show the word cloud which shows the most frequent words in currently shown files
BUTTONS.showMoreInfoDescription: Show file name, resolution, and video length
BUTTONS.showTagsMoreInfo: These tags are generated automatically from the file names. Clicking on any tag will find all files that contain the word in the file name
BUTTONS.showVideoNotesMoreInfo: Add any text notes to any video. Appears in details view
BUTTONS.sortOptionAlphabeticalMoreInfo: Show the alphabetical order option in the sorting dropdown
BUTTONS.sortOptionAspectRatioMoreInfo: Show the aspect ratio order option in the sorting dropdown
BUTTONS.sortOptionCreatedMoreInfo: Show the time created order option in the sorting dropdown
BUTTONS.sortOptionFolderSizeMoreInfo: Show the Number of Videos order option in the sorting dropdown
BUTTONS.sortOptionModifiedMoreInfo: Show the time modified order option in the sorting dropdown
BUTTONS.sortOptionSizeMoreInfo: Show the size order option in the sorting dropdown
BUTTONS.sortOptionStarMoreInfo: Show the star order option in the sorting dropdown
BUTTONS.sortOptionTagsMoreInfo: Show the tags order option in the sorting dropdown. Sort by number of tags
BUTTONS.sortOptionTimeMoreInfo: Show the duration order option in the sorting dropdown
BUTTONS.sortOptionTimesPlayedMoreInfo: Show the times played order option in the sorting dropdown
BUTTONS.sortOptionYearMoreInfo: Show the year order option in the sorting dropdown. Only affected by the year you manually set in the details view
BUTTONS.startWizardDescription: Start wizard again: create a new video hub or open recent
BUTTONS.tagExclusionMoreInfo: Filter to exclude any videos that contain the search tags
BUTTONS.tagFrequencySortDescription: Sort manual tags by frequency (otherwise alphabetically)
BUTTONS.tagIntersectionMoreInfo: Filter for videos containing each of the search tags
BUTTONS.tagUnionMoreInfo: Filter for videos containing any of the search tags
BUTTONS.thumbAutoAdvanceMoreInfo: Hovering over thumbnails cycles through screenshots
BUTTONS.videoNotesMoreInfo: Search through the notes you have added to your videos. Enable notes in the 'Manual tag settings'

RIGHTCLICK.errorFileNameExists: A file exists with this filename
RIGHTCLICK.errorFileNotFound: Original file could not be found
RIGHTCLICK.errorMustBeDifferent: new file name must be different
RIGHTCLICK.errorMustNotBeEmpty: new file name may not be empty

SETTINGS.extensionsInputError: Extensions input is invalid: insert extensions with seperating comma
SETTINGS.FAQ: Click here for help, documentation, FAQ, or to report a bug
SETTINGS.noClipsExtracted: No clips extracted for this hub
SETTINGS.showHideText: show / hide icon in the settings bar
SETTINGS.versionError: cannot check for new version at this time

SHORTCUTS.andClickAnyFile: and click any file to see the file details
SHORTCUTS.clickToRename: To change a shortcut, click on it and press desired key on your keyboard.
SHORTCUTS.showMoreInfo: Toggle file name, resolution, and length

STATISTICS.cleanScreenshotsHint: Delete thumbnails from videos no longer in the hub
STATISTICS.clickToConnect: Click to select where the folder is now located
STATISTICS.clickToRescan: Click to update hub with new files from this folder
STATISTICS.watchFolderHelpText: Update hub automatically when folder contents change

SYSTEM.fileRenameError: File was not renamed. Some error occurred.
SYSTEM.hubAlreadyExists: Hub already exists with this name
SYSTEM.pleaseChangeName: Please change the hub name above
SYSTEM.pressEscToStopRenaming: Renaming file. Press 'enter' to rename, 'esc' to cancel
SYSTEM.selectDefaultPlayer: Please select your preferred video player
SYSTEM.selectPreviousHub: Please select a previously-saved Video Hub file

TAGS.clickTagToAdd: Click any tag in the tray to add the tag to all selected videos

WELCOME.explore: Please explore other settings. There are many features that are not enabled by default.
WELCOME.settings: To access settings, please click on the gear on top-right.
WELCOME.tabs: To add more folders to your hub, update screenshots, add new videos, and more, please go to the fourth tab ('Current hub') in settings and click 'Edit folders'.

WIZARD.demoVersion: demo version limited to 50 video files
WIZARD.removeFromHistory: Remove this item from recent history
WIZARD.savingTo: Saving the video hub and screenshots to:
WIZARD.selectFolderWithVideo: Please select the folder with your video files
WIZARD.selectWhereFilesStored: Please select the folder where your Video Hub will be stored
